def main():
    S = input()
    T = input()
    if S == T:
        print("same")
    elif S.lower() == T.lower():
        print("case-insensitive")
    else:
        print("different")
    return


if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

N, X = map(int, input().split())

nums = list(map(int, input().split()))

nums.sort()

ans = 0
for i in range(N):
    ans += nums[i] * X
    if X > 1:
        X = X - 1

print(ans)
